about_the_game:
Enter the mix between Roguelike and Autobattler games you never knew you wanted! Create unique teams and explore countless synergies and posibilities; finding rule-changing Relics, powerful items and unlock new Units to aid you, as you delve deeper into the World Below.

OBTAIN POWERFUL RELICS

Reveal how far you can take your mastery of the game by creating never-before-seen strategies. Break the rules by collecting an unlimited number of Relics, claiming them from enemies, chests, or the remains of the titanic Bosses.

EQUIP POWERFUL ITEMS

Customize your units by equipping them with any of the over 75 powerful items available in the game, each with unique effects, stats, and synergies. From a simple carpenter's hammer to the legendary gloves of a forgotten hero, anything can make a difference in battle when placed in the right hands.

NEVER THE SAME BATTLE

Each enemy team you face is generated algorithmically, ensuring that you'll never encounter the same one twice and keeping the experience fresh. Be careful, though— they also want to claim your loot!

World Below currently features:

  • Over 50 playable and charismatic units

  • Over 75 diverse items

  • Over 50 Relics

  • More than 10 unique bosses

  • Innumerable synergies

  • Art, animations, and lots of love poured into the project

  • A one-person development team

I’ve been working on this project for almost a year, making sure to give it the best quality possible. I have nearly 8 years of experience as a programmer and a lifetime as an artist. It would mean a lot to me if you could take a look at my first commercial game!

Thank you for reading!
